body_html:
I would feel most comfortable if this API was introduced because it made something possible that was not possible to do before

Like I said earlier, the existing methods would work in theory, but the hard-coded value for the sys._getframe argument and the like make them very unflexible and malfunction for no good reason.

Would you be satisfied if get_data_files_path had a defaulted parameter for the hard-coded value, so that the logic could be shared with get_root_dir_with_all_resources and get_path_to_datafile?
And would you be okay if we keep get_abs_path and get_path_root?

body:
> I would feel most comfortable if this API was introduced because it made something possible that was not possible to do before

Like [I said earlier](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15315#issuecomment-353598678), the existing methods would work in theory, but the hard-coded value for the `sys._getframe` argument and the like make them very unflexible and malfunction for no good reason.

Would you be satisfied if `get_data_files_path` had a defaulted parameter for the hard-coded value, so that the logic could be shared with `get_root_dir_with_all_resources` and `get_path_to_datafile`?
And would you be okay if we keep `get_abs_path` and `get_path_root`?
